PersonEmployment.name: PersonEmployment
PersonEmployment.description: Represents information about a person’s employment.

AccountId.description: The Account associated with the Person Employment.

AnnualIncome.description: The annual income of the person.

EmployerAddress.description: The complete address of the employer.

EmployerCity.description: The city where the employer is located.

EmployerCountry.description: The country where the employer is located.

EmployerGeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

EmployerLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

EmployerLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

EmployerPostalCode.description: The postal code of the employer’s address.

EmployerState.description: The state of the employer’s address.

EmployerStreet.description: The street address of the employer.

EmployerTaxAccountNumber.description: The Tax Deduction and Collection Account Number (TAN) of the employer.

EmploymentStatus.description: Specifies the employment status with the employer.

EndDate.description: The last date of employment at this job.

HourlyWage.description: The hourly wage for the party.

IsCurrentEmployment.description: Indicates whether the person employment added is the current employer of the customer.

IsFlagged.description: Indicates whether the employment-related information requires additional scrutiny.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

Position.description: The last position of the person at this job.

RelatedPersonId.description: The person associated with the employment.

StartDate.description: The start date of employment at this job.

VerificationDate.description: The date of verification of the employment.

VerificationStatus.description: The status of verification of the employment.

WeeklyHourCount.description: The number of hours per week that the party works for the employer.

WorkerType.description: Specifies the worker type for the party that's employed.

HealthcareProviderId.description: The healthcare provider associated with the person employment.
